versions.localizedDescription:
## Version 1.0.0 – Stable Release

After many beta builds and countless bug reports, Nuvio Streaming App has reached its **first Stable release**!

## Highlights
- All major features from the beta phase are now included and refined.
- Stability improvements across the app.
- Numerous bug fixes and performance optimizations.

---

## A Note on Stability
This marks the **first Stable release (v1.0.0)** of Nuvio Streaming App.
While it's not completely bug-free, it is much more stable compared to previous beta builds. Remaining issues will continue to be addressed in future updates.

## Version 0.6.0-beta.11 – Update Notes

- Numerous bug fixes across the app.

### Video Player
- Fixed an issue on Android where sliders glitched while scrobbling.
- Added new features: users can now adjust **volume** and **brightness** directly in the app.
  - ⚠️ For iOS devices, the internal player (VLCKit) currently does not support adjusting audio through the player.
    Please use hardware volume buttons or system volume until this is implemented.
- Multiple fixes aimed at reducing **heating issues on iOS devices**.

### AI Features
- Initial implementation of **AI-powered insights** on each movie/show detail page (spoiler-free).
- Uses your **OpenRouter free API key** for access.
- More AI-driven features will be added in future updates.

---

ℹ️ This will likely be the **final Beta build before Stable**.
While not perfectly stable, it is more stable than expected for a beta release.

## Version 0.6.0-beta.10 – Hotfix Update Notes

- Immediate hotfix for an issue that caused iOS apps to crash after the latest OTA update.
- Android users are also recommended to update to this version to ensure compatibility and continue receiving further updates.

• Added **OTA (Over-The-Air) support** – this allows the app to receive UI and code changes without requiring manual updates each time.
  - Note: Major updates and fixes will still require a full app update or fresh install.
  - ⚠️ Some slowness and heating is expected during the first few minutes after OTA updates while changes are applied.
• Fixed an issue where trailers kept playing in the background when navigating to other screens.

• Focused primarily on fixing various visual glitches across the app.
• Video player optimizations for smoother playback.
• Optimized Hero Carousel performance.

• Added new Hero Section layout for mobile devices. Users can now choose between the old (legacy) layout and a new swipeable carousel-based layout.
• Expanded HomeScreen customization:
  - Option to enable/disable text under posters.
  - Option to adjust poster size and corner radius.
• Minor UI changes and code fixes.

• Added a Trailer API to display trailers in the Hero Section (limited content available).
• Fixed redundant IMDb rating issue.
• Fixed sign-in page opening issue.
• Many minor backend fixes and improvements.
Initial release of Nuvio streaming app
